sentences.sentence: Israel's Prime Minister says he does not want to occupy Gaza as the military agrees to daily humanitarian pauses to get aid to the northern part of the enclave. Working in a war zone, teachers in Gaza detail their plight continuing lessons within schools turned refuge centers. Internationally recognized Italian actor Monica Bellucci recognized for her contribution to film at a festival in Greece Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Netanyahu claims his country does not intend to occupy or govern the Gaza Strip after its war on the Palestinian enclave is over but instead asserted an interview with US TV channel Fox News this country wants to radically reshape it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: This comes a few hours after Israel agreed to provide daily humanitarian pauses in northern Gaza. More than 10,800 Palestinians, including more than 4,400 children, have died in Gaza since the war began. Earlier on Thursday, a representative from Islamic Jihad said the group is ready to release two Israeli hostages, a 77-year-old woman and a 12-year-old boy, for humanitarian reasons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Yemen's Houthi rebels said they fired a batch of ballistic missiles towards Israeli targets. In turn, Israel said the drone exploded in the yard of a house in Eilat, while a missile was intercepted before reaching the country's airspace.

sentences.sentence: In the occupied West Bank, the situation is becoming more and more tense.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Israeli forces commenced a several hours-long raid in Janin refugee camp, which killed at least 14 Palestinians and wounded 20.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: According to UN data, this was the deadliest raid on the camp since 2005.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Since Israel began its relentless bombardment after Hamas's 7th of October attack, schools inside the besieged enclave have become makeshift refuge centers for thousands of displaced Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The trade union Education International says so far at least 130 teachers have been killed in Israeli strikes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: While Israeli bombs continue to fall outside, teachers are still trying to conduct lessons inside. وعندما تباً تباً للبطلين العزيزين، يحاولون ماد أقطاع غزة ولكن الأمر كما انتعدى لطالباتي أنا فقدت الكثير من طالباتي التي كنت أدرسهن استشهدنا في قصف الاحتلال الإسرائيلي هؤلاء أشخاص من المدرسة التي يميزون فيها يحاولون أن يجدوا حدوثاً من المساعدة ويجعلونهن مفهوماً كنا نسيح أنا وخوتي ونذهب إلى المدرسة هذا لا يجده مفهومًا في كل شيء كنت أذهب إلى المدرسة لأتعلم وأقعد مع الأساد وأتعلم وأتثقف وليس كما الآن أجي على المدرسة كمركز لواء لا في ميا ولا كهرباء والحياة صعبة جدا أكثر من 2 ثرد من المناطق في غازة، 2.3 مليون من الناس لقد رحلوا من حياتهم منذ أن بدأت الحرب وقالت الحكومة المتحدة المتحدة، أكثر من 11.070 من المناطق المتحدة، 66% من المناطق المتحدة ومن المناطق المتحدة لقد قتلوا، وكذلك 2650 من الناس لقد رحلوا 1,070 Palestinians, 66% of them women and minors, have been killed. Another 2,650 people have been reported missing.

sentences.sentence: Violence on the streets of central Madrid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's the seventh night protesters have rallied outside the Socialist Party headquarters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They're angry about plans by acting Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez to form a coalition government with the Catalan Separatist Party Estos acuerdos de la vergüenza no resuelven ningún problema, sino que los agravan todos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Y por lo tanto comienza un periodo negro en la historia de España.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: El acuerdo de coalición con el líder separatista de Cataluña, Carlos Puigdemont, fue alcanzado el viernes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Los socialistas fueron los que se levantaron en la elección general de julio detrás del partido conservador, pero mejor lugar para formar una alianza de gobierno. on Thursday. The socialists were runners-up in July's general election behind the main conservative party, but better placed to forming a government alliance. The agreement increases Sanchez's chances of retaining power.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Parts of northern Europe, particularly northwest France, are braced for more flooding, with heavy rain forecast later on Friday and into the weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Across Normandy and Pas-de-Calais, some towns remain inundated after earlier downpours brought by Storm Kieran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Both areas are under red alert, with rainfall up to 90 millimetres expected and wind gusts as high as 90 kilometres per hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Emergency crews are working to prevent riverbanks from overflowing and causing more flooding.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Prince Harry and Sir Elton John have won their latest round in their legal battle with British newspapers along with five other public figures including actress Elizabeth Hurley. They brought the lawsuit in October last year. They alleged they were victims of gross breaches of privacy by associated newspapers who have been accused of placing listening devices in people's homes and paid police to obtain sensitive information for years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Publishers of the Daily Mail and Mail on Sunday argued that their claims were brought too late, but the judge said the case could go ahead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: claims were brought too late but the judge said the case could go ahead

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: transgender Catholics can now be baptized and serve as godparents in some cases as according to a statement published by the Vatican this week this comes after a contradictory statement by U.S bishops rejected the idea of gender transition earlier this year leaving many feeling excluded by their religion since being elected Pope Francis has made moves to make the church more welcoming to the LGBTQ plus community, such as saying homosexuality is not a crime and that God loves all his children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Despite this, the statement also maintained a ban on same-sex couples serving as godparents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The European Parliament and EU member states have reached an agreement on a biodiversity

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: bill aimed at protecting and restoring fragile habitats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The nature restoration law requires member states to implement measures to restore at least 20 per cent of land and marine areas by 2030 and all damaged ecosystems by 2050.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Critics say the plan doesn't go far enough to tackle Europe's biodiversity challenges. Some MEPs argued it would harm Europe's food production and threaten livelihoods.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As governments throughout the world race to regulate artificial intelligence,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: focus on international cooperation, particularly with China, is intensifying.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It was a key topic at Euronews' international AI summit in Brussels this week, with many people saying it could prove difficult to cooperate with Beijing on AI standards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: I think it's fair to say that the geopolitical reality is not very conducive to deep meaningful cooperation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: There is a very much escalating tech war between the U.S. and China. There's tremendous race for technological supremacy. There's concern who is the economic power, the technological power, the geopolitical power. And there's also vast ideological differences. So it is hard to see the U.S. and the EU to agree with China in particularly meaningful substantive rules around AI. The explosion of interest in artificial intelligence could not have come at a more awkward time, given the global effort needed to work together on setting safety standards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But there is some hope amid all the geopolitical tension. Last week saw the historic Bletchley declaration in the UK where the US and China both signed an agreement on AI safety. There's also optimism in the business-to-business area. I'm very optimistic when it comes to what can be done between companies, between engineers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Chinese companies are already playing a really active role.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: As long as these conversations can continue and even maybe be facilitated by governments, despite the geopolitical tensions, I think there will be progress going forward.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But for the MEP leading the charge on the EU's AI Act, cooperation with China on the technology should for now be secondary. First, the collective West needs to get its own house in order. Because it is the same when addressing governance at a global stage, when addressing standards at a global stage, there is an inevitable dialogue with China. But what I've always said is that first and foremost, we have to make sure that we are first aligned. Us, the democracies that understand technology in the same way and its role in society, we have to first get ourselves as convergent as we can, as aligned as we can, and then have a proper conversation with China to make sure that we can address as many as the other, let's say, bigger risks, including geopolitical risks, in a framework that also includes them. Next week could see another historic moment in the West's cooperation with Beijing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden will likely meet with Chinese leader Xi Jinping, which could lay the groundwork for future cooperation on artificial intelligence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Chris Lepitch, Azura News, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The rescue vessel has completed two operations. First, it rescued 41 people at dawn and another 77 last night. Among those rescued are four unaccompanied minors. The migrants were from several countries. According to the Italian Interior Ministry, more than 145,000 migrants have arrived in Italy by sea this year.

sentences.sentence: The irreversible and Passion of the Christ star accepted the Golden Alexander Award at the 64th Thessaloniki Film Festival in Greece.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: There was a special screening of Giuseppe Tonatore's erotic comedy-drama, Melena, in which Bellucci played the lead role. I'm so grateful to this amazing artist Maria Callas because I have to say that as I say all the time what really moved me to this project is the duality of Maria Callas because she was a diva, a divinity, a donor of immense talent and at the same time she was a womana, divinity, a daughter of immense talent, and at the same time she was a woman with a simple heart.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The former model turned actor has featured in comedies, dramas and historical films in various languages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At the age of 59, Bellucci continues to model for Dior and Dolce & Gabbana.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: She recently hinted at adding director to her list of credits.
